Is this game safe on xbox live i scanned it with abgx360 and it said dmi is unvalid

To Burn this, download imgburn, go to settings>write and set the layer break to 1913760. Then go to write image file to disk, insert your DL disk and browse for the .dvd file (Do not select the .iso file) set the write speed to x2.4 if you have it. x3 will work just fine but has a slightly lower success rate. Then hit write and wait for it to finish. Hope this helped.
